newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Activity slows on Saudi stock market in the week.
newsitem.headline: Activity slows on Saudi stock market in the week.

text.p: Activity slowed on the Saudi stock market last week, with the value and volume of trade down, official figures released on Sunday showed.
The Saudi Arabian Monetary Agency (SAMA) said turnover in the week to Thursday declined to three million shares from 5.28 million shares a week earlier.
The value of shares traded fell to 654.5 million riyals ($174.5 million) from a previous 926.3 million riyals.
SAMA, quoted by the official Saudi Press Agency, said of the 59 firms traded last week, shares of 19 rose, 36 fell and four were unchanged.
The agency said cement stocks dominated trade, with 1.2 million shares worth 226.4 million riyals changing hands.
The services sector came next with 741,603 shares worth 55 million riyals traded.
